sentences.sContent: Such emissions can sweep away virtually all of the cold, compact dust in a galaxy, thereby preventing that dust from ever congealing into new stars.
sentences.sContent_eng: Such emissions can sweep away virtually all of the cold, compact dust in a galaxy, thereby preventing that dust from ever congealing into new stars.
sentences.sCn: 如此巨大数量的射线，实际上可以扫除一个星系中所有的尘埃，因此导致无法形成新的星体。

sentences.sContent: Then electric fields generated by the solar wind sweep away the charged particles.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then electric fields generated by the solar wind sweep away the charged particles.
sentences.sCn: 然后，太阳风产生的电场将带电粒子一扫而空。
